name: Seria
subtitle: Shadow of the Abyss
description: Seria is the 101st heir of the ShadowHilts, a family of hunters that slays non-human, supernatural beings. She came all the way to Orvelia as a vampire hunter, seeking vengeance against her sister who turned into a vampire and slaughtered her comrades. Seria is also trying to save her little sister by putting her out of her misery.
story: The 101st Heir of ShadowHilt and the sister of Erze. People call her cold-blooded for her unfriendly attitude, but she used to be all smiles when she was around her beloved sister, Erze. Seria always felt sorry for her feeble sister and was overprotective of her, without realizing that it was actually putting Erze in greater despair. One day, Erze fell into a trap during a mission. She was saved, but her sickness started to worsen dramatically. Meanwhile, Seria was sent to Windland Snow Mountain to follow the traces of the Vampire Princess. She had a glimpse of what was going on with her sister, but she left for the top-priority mission, praying that she was wrong. However, the tragedy struck the sisters as if it mocking Seria's prayers. - Oh, my beloved sister, Seria! Seria returned to find the corpses of her comrades lying on the ground, cold as ice. Erze welcomed her with two sharp fangs, thirsting for blood. Seria trembled with waves of emotions. Her heart was breaking, yet she spoke in a cold, calm tone. - You... you are not my little sister anymore. You're a filthy bloodsucker.
like: Her sister Erze, strawberry parfait, fine swords, the moon.

talk: Looks like the night street is still safe here.
You've got some good comrades. Comrades... Ha.
Would I ever be able to have faith in anyone else again?...
recruit.gift: I'm not taking requests at the moment. I have my own reasons.

affinity.greet: Did I not tell you that I don't receive requests?
talk: I'm here to find someone. I don't have to tell you who it is, do I?...It's my sister. I'm looking for my sister.
We're bumping into each other quite frequently. Are you here looking for someone yourself? If it's your comrade or family, cherish them...
affinity.gift: ... Thank you, I'm just... I'm sorry, and I appreciate it.

talk: All those hellish nights Erze suffered in agony... I failed to do anything for her. Perhaps it was me that made her into what she is now. Yes, it's all my fault...
The most I can do for her is put her soul to rest. There's no other way. Whenever I think of it, I feel my heart breaking all over again... My mind refuses to raise my sword against my sister.
I... I wanted to say thank you. Thank you for talking to me... listening to me. If we meet again, then...

uw.name: Executioner of Domains, Elsion
description: Own Heal Rate is reduced by 20%. Upon a critical skill hit, deals additional M.DMG by 30% of ATK. Hit target's Heal Rate is reduced by 24% for 5 sec, and increases own Heal Rate by 4% for 20 sec. The Heal rate increasing effect can be stacked up to 5 times.

Own Heal Rate is reduced by 20%. Upon a critical skill hit, deals additional M.DMG by 36% of ATK. Reduces Heal Rate of the target by 29% for 5 sec, and increases own Heal Rate by 5% for 20 sec. The Heal rate increasing effect can be stacked up to 5 times.

Own Heal Rate is reduced by 20%. Upon a critical skill hit, deals additional M.DMG by 42% of ATK. Reduces Heal Rate of the target by 35% for 5 sec, and increases own Heal Rate by 6% for 20 sec. The Heal rate increasing effect can be stacked up to 5 times.

Own Heal Rate is reduced by 20%. Upon a critical skill hit, deals additional M.DMG by 51% of ATK. Reduces Heal Rate of the target by 42% for 5 sec, and increases own Heal Rate by 7% for 20 sec. The Heal rate increasing effect can be stacked up to 5 times.

Own Heal Rate is reduced by 20%. Upon a critical skill hit, deals additional M.DMG by 63% of ATK. Reduces Heal Rate of the target by 50% for 5 sec, and increases own Heal Rate by 9% for 20 sec. The Heal rate increasing effect can be stacked up to 5 times.

Own Heal Rate is reduced by 20%. Upon a critical skill hit, deals additional M.DMG by 75% of ATK. Reduces Heal Rate of the target by 60% for 5 sec, and increases own Heal Rate by 10% for 20 sec. The Heal rate increasing effect can be stacked up to 5 times.
uw.story: A sword of authority passed down to the masters of ShadowHilts. This sword contains the power of mighty beings that made a pact to serve the ShadowHilts. Some of them were Elementals, some were innocent spirits, and some even demons. It is known that tens of thousands of evil forces fell to this sword. It also has a demonic quality that binds the spirit of the slain evil to the blade. Despite its great power, fewer than 5 people in 600 years that were able to wield this sword. Seria, the 101st Heir of ShadowHilts and the only master in history chosen by the sword, entered the pact with the sword to put her beloved sister to rest.

s1.name: Mysterious Sword - Falling Petals
s1.description: Performs a horizontal slash to the front and deals {0} M.DMG to the target and enemies in a narrow range. Can activate [Mysterious Sword - Blossom] once within 5 sec after use.
s1.light: [Mysterious Sword - Falling Petals] - Mana cost is reduced by 1. [Mysterious Sword - Blossom] - Hit enemies' heal rate is reduced by 50% for 5 sec.
s1.dark: [Mysterious Sword - Falling Petals] - Target takes 25% increased M.DMG for 10 sec. [Mysterious Sword - Blossom] - Mana cost is increased by 1, and Ignores enemy's DEF.

linked.name: Mysterious Sword - Blossom
linked.description: Performs a vertical slash to the front and deals {0} M.DMG to the target and enemies in a narrow range.

s2.name: Blood Scattering Blade
s2.description: Rapidly charges forward to deal {0} M.DMG and inflicts irremovable Original Sin of Blood on enemies for {1} sec. Enemies under Original Sin of Blood have their ATK Spd reduced by {2}. Shortly afterward, attacks enemies under Original Sin of Blood 2 times, and deals additional {3} M.DMG, and if the target is not a hero, deals additional {4} DEF Ignoring M.DMG.
s2.dark: Upon each DMG dealt, recovers 200 Mana.

ut.name: Ring of Abyss
description: [Blood Scattering Blade] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces M.Block of affected enemies by 200.
[Blood Scattering Blade] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces M.Block of affected enemies by 240.
[Blood Scattering Blade] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces M.Block of affected enemies by 290.
[Blood Scattering Blade] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces M.Block of affected enemies by 350.
[Blood Scattering Blade] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces M.Block of affected enemies by 420.
[Blood Scattering Blade] Increases DMG by 50% and reduces M.Block of affected enemies by 500.
ut.story: A silver ring that represents the ShadowHilts. Seria touches it whenever she feels her life is meaningless. Doing so would remind her of her dead comrades, filling her heart with the need for vengeance against her sister Erze. Ironically, the ring has a note written by Erze, hidden within the ring's jewel when she was young, but Seria still doesn't know about it.

s3.name: Red Moon Blade
s3.description: Brandishes a moon-bloodying sword, dealing {0} M.DMG to enemies in a wide range, and additional {1} M.DMG on non-Hero enemies. When the moon is ripe, gains Moonlight for {2} sec, and when cast at this state, deals {3} M.DMG to enemies and reduces their Heal Rate by {4}%. If the target is not a hero, deals additional {5} M.DMG.The caster is not affected by ATK Spd related effects while casting.
s3.light: Dispels positive effects of all enemies in range.
s3.dark: Increases Mana Cost by 1 and ignores DEF when attacking Non-Hero enemies.

ut.name: Enlightening Candlelight
description: [Red Moon Blade] Gains immunity to CC for the duration of the skill. When the battle starts, increases DMG by 70% for 4 time.
[Red Moon Blade] Gains immunity to CC for the duration of the skill. When the battle starts, increases DMG by 70% for 5 time.
[Red Moon Blade] Gains immunity to CC for the duration of the skill. When the battle starts, increases DMG by 70% for 6 time.
[Red Moon Blade] Gains immunity to CC for the duration of the skill. When the battle starts, increases DMG by 70% for 7 time.
[Red Moon Blade] Gains immunity to CC for the duration of the skill. When the battle starts, increases DMG by 70% for 9 time.
[Red Moon Blade] Gains immunity to CC for the duration of the skill. When the battle starts, increases DMG by 70% for 10 time.
ut.story: The candle known to have been on the table of the meeting hall where ancient warriors from different continents gathered to defeat supernatural beings. Blazing on this old candle is a blue exorcising flame. When the flame touches an evil being, it sucks the vitality out of the creature's body. This is the first material Seria uses whenever she refines her sword.

s4.name: Cold-Blooded Witch
s4.description: ATK is increased by {0}. Upon a critical skill hit, own Crit DMG is increased by {1}%. This effect can be stacked up to 30 times.
s4.dark: When the battle starts, increases DMG to Non-Hero enemies by 25% for 200 sec.

t5.dark: All of caster's attacks will be critical hits, but the caster becomes unable to block while taking 25% increased damage.
